headline: Hydrolix Accelerates Growth with $80M Series C, Industry Recognition and Global Streaming Success with Streaming Data Lake Platform
summary: On the heels of its $80 million Series C investment led by QED Investors, Hydrolix enters the second half of 2025 with major momentum in funding, customers, partnerships and product line extension. Over the past year, the streaming data lake company has emerged as a breakout player in AI-driven cloud observability and log analytics, expanding its partner ecosystem, securing major industry awards, and supporting some of the world's largest streaming events with real-time observability at scale.
